name: Causera Inc.
description: Provider of an online parents communication platform. The company provides a web-based platform for group communication that allows parents to communication with various groups, including classrooms, PTAs, school communities, scout troops, sports teams, and groups of family and friends.
one_liner: Provider of an online parents communication platform. The company provides a web-based platform for group communication that allows parents to communication with various groups, including classrooms, PTAs, school communities, scout troops, sports teams, and groups of family and friends.
